name: Upload
title: Gcloud
Upload
description:
Upload Settings

Upload allows users to configure how files are uploaded to the Google Cloud Service APIs.

examples.code:
require "gcloud/upload"

# Set the default threshold to 10 MiB.
Gcloud::Upload.resumable_threshold = 10_000_000

methods.name: resumable_threshold
title: Gcloud
Upload.resumable_threshold
methods.description:
Retrieve resumable threshold. If uploads are larger in size than this value then resumable uploads are used.

The default value is 5 MiB (5,000,000 bytes).

methods.name: resumable_threshold=
title: Gcloud
Upload.resumable_threshold=
methods.description: Sets a new resumable threshold value in number of bytes.

methods.name: default_chunk_size
title: Gcloud
Upload.default_chunk_size
methods.description:
Default chunk size used on resumable uploads.

The default value is 10 MB (10,485,760 bytes).

methods.name: default_chunk_size=
title: Gcloud
Upload.default_chunk_size=
methods.description: Sets a new default chunk_size value in number of bytes. Must be a multiple of 256KB (262,144).
